name: rdns
description: Resolves hostnames using reverse DNS lookups. If a lookup fails, keeps the event but doesn't add the field. Results are cached internally.

parameters.name: ip_field
parameters.description: The field containing IP addresses to resolve

parameters.name: as
parameters.description: The name of the output field to store the resolved hostname

notes: Limited by MAX_STATE_LIMIT (default 20000 events). Timeout applied to prevent blocking. Results cached for faster subsequent queries. Works better in live queries than static queries due to caching. Failed lookups may succeed on subsequent executions.
